chapter.text: alif॰ laam॰ ra॰. yah kitaab arthaat spasht quraan kee aayaten hain
aise samay aaenge jab inakaar karanevaale kaamana karenge ki kya hee achchha hota ki ham muslim (aagyaakaaree) hote
chhodo unhen khaen aur maze udaen aur (lambee) aasha unhen bhulaave mein daale rakhe. unhen jald hee maaloom ho jaega
hamane jis bastee ko bhee vinasht kiya hai, usake lie anivaaryatah ek nishchit faisala raha hai
kisee samudaay ke log na apane nishchi‍ta samay se aage badh sakate hai aur na ve peechhe rah sakate hai
ve kahate hai, "ai vyakti, jisapar anusmaran avatarit hua, tum nishchay hee deevaane ho
yadi tum sachche ho to hamaare samaksh farishton ko kyon nahin le aate
farishton ko ham keval saty ke prayojan hetu utaarate hai aur us samay logon ko muhalat nahin milegee
yah anusaran nishchay hee hamane avatarit kiya hai aur ham svayan isake rakshak hain
tumase pahale kitane hee vigat gironhon mein ham rasool bhej chuke hai
koee bhee rasool unake paas aisa nahin aaya, jisaka unhonne upahaas na kiya ho
isee tarah ham aparaadhiyon ke dilon mein ise utaarate hai
ve ise maanenge nahin. pahale ke logon kee misaalen guzar chukee hain
yadi ham unapar aakaash se koee dvaar khol den aur ve din-dahaade usamen chadhane bhee lagen
phir bhee ve yahee kahenge, "hamaaree aankhen madamaatee hain, balki ham logon par jaadoo kar diya gaya hai
hamane aakaash mein burj (taara-samooh) banae aur hamane use dekhanevaalon ke lie susajjit bhee kiya
aur har phitakaare hue shaitaan se use surakshit rakha
yah aur baat hai ki kisee ne choree-chhipe kuchh sunagun le liya to ek pratyaksh agnishikha ne bhee jhapatakar usaka peechha kiya
aur hamane dharatee ko phailaaya aur usamen atal pahaad daal die aur usamen har cheez nape-tule andaaz mein ugaee
aur usamen tumhaare guzar-basar ke saamaan nirmit kie, aur unako bhee jinako rozee denevaale tum nahin ho
koee bhee cheez to aisee nahin hai jisake bhandaar hamaare paas na hon, phir bhee ham use ek gyaat (nishchint) maatra ke saath utaarate hai
ham hee varsha laanevaalee havaon ko bhejate hai. phir aakaash se paanee barasaate hai aur usase tumhen sinchit karate hai. usake khajaanaadaar tum nahin ho
ham hee jeevan aur mrtyu dete hai aur ham hee uttaraadhikaaree rah jaate hai
ham tumhaare pahale ke logon ko bhee jaanate hai aur baad ke aanevaalon ko bhee ham jaanate hai
tumhaara rab hee hai, jo unhen ikattha karega. nissandeh vah tatvadarshee, sarvagy hai
hamane manushy ko sade hue gaare kee khanakhanaatee huee mittee se banaaya hai
aur usase pahale ham jinnon ko loo roopee agni se paida kar chuke the
yaad karo jab tumhaare rab ne farishton se kaha, "main sade hue gaare kee khanakhanaatee huee mittee se ek manushy paida karanevaala hoon
to jab main use poora bana chukoon aur usamen apanee rooh phoonk doon to tum usake aage sajade mein gir jaana
atev sab ke sab farishto ne sajada kiya
sivaay ibalees ke. usane sajada karanevaalon ke saath shaamil hone se inakaar kar diya
kaha, "ai ibalees! tujhe kya hua ki too sajada karanevaalon mein shaamil nahin hua
usane kaha, "main aisa nahin hoon ki main us manushy ko sajada karoon jisako too ne sade hue gaare kee khanakhanaatee hue mittee se banaaya.
kaha, "achchha, too nikal ja yahaan se, kyonki tujhapar phitakaar hai
nishchay hee badale ke din tak tujh par dhikkaar hai.
usane kaha, "mere rab! phir too mujhe us din tak ke lie muhalat de, jabaki sab uthae jaenge.
kaha, "achchha, tujhe muhalat hai
us din tak ke lie jisaka samay gyaat evan niyat hai.
usane kaha, "mere rab! isalie ki toone mujhe seedhe maarg se vichalit kar diya hai, atah main bhee dharatee mein unake lie manamohakata paida karoonga aur un sabako bahakaakar rahoonga
sivaay unake jo tere chune hue bande honge.
kaha, "mujh tak pahunchane ka yahee seedha maarg hai
mere bandon par to tera kuchh zor na chalega, sivaay un bahake hue logon ko jo tere peechhe ho len
nishchay hee jahannam hee ka aise samast logon se vaada hai
usake saat dvaar hai. pratyek dvaar ke lie ek khaas hissa hoga.
nissandeh dar rakhanevaale baagon aur sroton mein honge
pravesh karo inamen nirbhayataapoorvak salaamatee ke saath
unake seenon mein jo man-mutaav hoga use ham door kar denge. ve bhaee-bhaee banakar aamane-saamane takhton par honge
unhen vahaan na to koee thakaan aur takaleef pahunchegee aur na ve vahaan se kabhee nikaale hee jaenge
mere bandon ko soochit kar do ki main atyant kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hoon
aur yah ki meree yaatana bhee atyant dukhadaayinee yaatana hai
aur unhen ibaraaheem ke atithiyon ka vrttaant sunao
jab ve usake yahaan aae aur unhonne salaam kiya to usane kaha, "hamen to tumase dar lag raha hai.
ve bole, "daro nahin, ham tumhen ek gyaanavaan putr kee shubh soochana dete hai.
usane kaha, "kya tum mujhe shubh soochana de rahe ho, is avastha mein ki mera budhaapa aa gaya hai? to ab mujhe kis baat kee shubh soochana de rahe ho
unhonne kaha, "ham tumhen sachchee shubh soochana de rahe hain, to tum niraash na ho
usane kaha, "apane rab kee dayaaluta se pathabhrashton ke siva aur kaun niraash hoga
usane kaha, "ai dooto, tum kis abhiyaan par aae ho
ve bole, "ham to ek aparaadhee qaum kee or bheje gae hai
sivaay loot ke gharavaalon ke. un sabako to ham bacha lenge
sivaay usakee patnee ke - hamane nishchit kar diya hai, vah to peechhe rah jaanevaalon mein rahengee.
phir jab ye doot loot ke yahaan pahunche
to usane kaha, "tum to aparichit log ho.
unhonne kaha, "nahin, balki ham to tumhaare paas vahee cheez lekar aae hai, jisake vishay mein ve sandeh kar rahe the
aur ham tumhaare paas yaqeenee cheez lekar aae hai, aur ham bilakul sach kah rahe hai

atev ab tum apane gharavaalon ko lekar raatri ke kisee hisse mein nikal jao, aur svayan un sabake peechhe-peechhe chalo. aur tumamen se koee bhee peechhe mudakar na dekhe. bas chale jao, jidhar ka tumhe aadesh hai.
hamane use apana yah faisala pahuncha diya ki praatah hote-hote unakee jad kat chukee hogee
itane mein nagar ke log khush-khush aa pahunche
usane kaha, "ye mere atithi hai. meree fazeehat mat karana
allaah ka dar rakho, mujhe rusava na karo.
unhonne kaha, "kya hamane tumhen duniya bhar ke logon ka zimma lene se roka nahin tha
usane kaha, "tumako yadi kuchh karana hai, to ye meree (qaum kee) betiyaan (vidhitah vivaah ke lie) maujood hai.
tumhaare jeevan kee saugandh, ve apanee mastee mein khoe hue the
antatah pau phatate-phatate ek bhayankar aavaaz ne unhen aa liya
aur hamane us bastee ko talapat kar diya, aur unapar kankareele patthar barasae
nishchay hee isamen bhaapanevaalon ke lie nishaaniyaan hai
aur vah (bastee) saarvajanik maarg par hai
nishchay hee isamen mominon ke lie ek badee nishaanee hai
aur nishchay hee aisa vaale bhee atyaachaaree the
phir hamane unase bhee badala liya, aur ye donon (bhoo-bhaag) khule maarg par sthit hai
hijravaale bhee rasoolon ko jhuthala chuke hai
hamane to unhen apanee nishaaniyaan pradaan kee thee, parantu ve unakee upeksha hee karate rahe
ve badee befikree se pahaado ko kaat-kaatakar ghar banaate the
antatah ek bhayaanak aavaaz ne praatah hote- hote unhen aa liya
phir jo kuchh ve kamaate rahe, vah unake kuchh kaam na aa saka

hamane to aakaashon aur dharatee ko aur jo kuchh unake madhy hai, soddeshy paida kiya hai, aur vah qiyaamat kee ghadee to anivaaryatah aanevaalee hai. atah tum bhalee prakaar daraguzar (kshama) se kaam lo
nishchay hee tumhaara rab hee bada paida karanevaala, sab kuchh jaananevaala hai
hamane tumhen saat masaanee ka samooh yaanee mahaan quraan diya
jo kuchh sukh-saamagree hamane unamen se vibhinn prakaar ke logon ko dee hai, tum usapar apanee aankhen na pasaaro aur na unapar dukhee ho, tum to apanee bhujaen mominon ke lie jhukae rakho
aur kah do, "main to saaf-saaf chetaavanee denevaala hoon.
jis prakaar hamane hissa-bakhara karanevaalon par utaara tha
jinhonne (apane) quraan ko tukade-tukade kar daala
ab tumhaare rab kee qasam! ham avashy hee un sabase usake vishay mein poochhenge
jo kuchh ve karate rahe.
atah tumhen jis cheez ka aadesh hua hai, use haank-pukaarakar bayaan kar do, aur mushariko kee or dhyaan na do
upahaas karanevaalon ke lie ham tumhaaree or se kaafee hai
jo allaah ke saath doosaron ko poojy-prabhu thaharaate hai, to sheeghr hee unhen maaloom ho jaega
ham jaanate hai ki ve jo kuchh kahate hai, usase tumhaara dil tang hota hai
to tum apane rab ka gunagaan karo aur sajada karanevaalon mein sammilit raho
aur apane rab kee bandagee mein lage raho, yahaan tak ki jo yaqeenee hai, vah tumhaare saamane aa jae
